kDesc
A black leotard with grey tights down to the feet. [#Legal]
Body noir et collants gris couvrants jusqu’aux orteils. [#Legal]
Schwarzer Gymnastikanzug und graue Stockings, die auch die Zehenspitzen umfassen.[#Legal]
Body nero e collant grigi che coprono tutto il piede.[#Legal]
Leotardo negro y medias grises que cubren hasta los pies.[#Legal]
黒いレオタードと、足先まで覆うグレーのタイツ。[#Legal]
검은색 레오타드와 발끝까지 덮는 회색 타이츠. [#Legal]
A black leotard with gray tights down to the feet. [#Legal]
黑色緊身衣和長至腳底的灰色緊身褲。[#Legal]
黑色緊身衣和長至腳底的灰色緊身褲。[#Legal]
A black leotard and gray tights covering down to the toes.[#Legal]
